北京.name: 北京
北京.ai_briefing_zh: 北京阳光正好，体感 7℃，早晚温差大，注意保暖哦！
北京.ai_briefing_en: Beijing is sunny and cool at 7℃. Remember to dress warmly in the morning and evening!

慈溪.name: 慈溪
慈溪.ai_briefing_zh: 慈溪阳光明媚，体感 16℃，真是出门踏青的好天气！
慈溪.ai_briefing_en: Cixi is bright and sunny, feeling 16℃. Perfect weather for an outing!

上海.name: 上海
上海.ai_briefing_zh: 上海阳光普照，体感 16℃。今天是个好日子，记得多喝水！
上海.ai_briefing_en: Shanghai is bathed in sunshine, feeling 16℃. Enjoy the beautiful day, and stay hydrated!

广州.name: 广州
广州.ai_briefing_zh: 广州体感 24℃，天气暖洋洋的。紫外线强，别忘了防晒哦！
广州.ai_briefing_en: Guangzhou feels a warm 24℃. The sun is strong, don't forget your sunscreen!

深圳.name: 深圳
深圳.ai_briefing_zh: 深圳阳光正好，体感 23℃。湿度稍高，小心别着凉呀。
深圳.ai_briefing_en: Shenzhen is sunny and feels 23℃. It's a bit humid, stay comfortable!

杭州.name: 杭州
杭州.ai_briefing_zh: 杭州阳光正好，体感 15℃。春意盎然，出门走走很舒服。
杭州.ai_briefing_en: Hangzhou is sunny and feels 15℃. Spring is in the air, enjoy a pleasant walk!

南京.name: 南京
南京.ai_briefing_zh: 南京阳光明媚，体感 14℃。早晚温差大，别忘了添衣哦。
南京.ai_briefing_en: Nanjing is sunny and feels 14℃. Mind the temperature difference between morning and evening, add layers!

成都.name: 成都
成都.ai_briefing_zh: 成都阴天，体感 10℃。湿度 70%，出门带件薄外套吧。
成都.ai_briefing_en: Chengdu is cloudy and feels 10℃. With 70% humidity, bring a light jacket!

武汉.name: 武汉
武汉.ai_briefing_zh: 武汉阳光正好，体感 14℃。舒适宜人，尽情享受今天吧！
武汉.ai_briefing_en: Wuhan is sunny and feels 14℃. Enjoy this comfortable day to the fullest!

西安.name: 西安
西安.ai_briefing_zh: 西安阴天，体感 9℃。气温稍凉，多喝水，注意保湿哦。
西安.ai_briefing_en: Xi'an is cloudy and feels 9℃. It's a bit cool, stay hydrated and moisturize!

重庆.name: 重庆
重庆.ai_briefing_zh: 重庆有雾，体感 10℃。湿度很高，出行注意安全哦。
重庆.ai_briefing_en: Chongqing is foggy and feels 10℃. With high humidity, please travel safely.

哈尔滨.name: 哈尔滨
哈尔滨.ai_briefing_zh: 哈尔滨体感 -5℃，阵阵西风凉意浓。请务必穿暖和！
哈尔滨.ai_briefing_en: Harbin feels -5℃ with a chilly west wind. Please dress very warmly!

沈阳.name: 沈阳
沈阳.ai_briefing_zh: 沈阳阳光正好，体感 3℃，风力 3级。出门别忘戴帽子围巾。
沈阳.ai_briefing_en: Shenyang is sunny and feels 3℃ with a level 3 wind. Don't forget your hat and scarf!

昆明.name: 昆明
昆明.ai_briefing_zh: 昆明阳光明媚，体感 12℃。风力 4级，注意防风哦！
昆明.ai_briefing_en: Kunming is sunny and feels 12℃. With a level 4 wind, remember to protect yourself from the wind!

厦门.name: 厦门
厦门.ai_briefing_zh: 厦门阳光灿烂，体感 20℃。温度适宜，享受海滨风情吧！
厦门.ai_briefing_en: Xiamen is sunny and feels 20℃. The temperature is perfect, enjoy the seaside!

青岛.name: 青岛
青岛.ai_briefing_zh: 青岛阳光正好，体感 13℃。海风轻拂，舒适宜人。
青岛.ai_briefing_en: Qingdao is sunny and feels 13℃. A gentle sea breeze makes it very pleasant.

大连.name: 大连
大连.ai_briefing_zh: 大连有霾，体感 6℃。风力 3级，外出请佩戴口罩哦。
大连.ai_briefing_en: Dalian is hazy and feels 6℃ with a level 3 wind. Please wear a mask if you go out.
